main event: A civilian observed a yellowish egg-shaped light traveling back and forth across the sky in Litchfield, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 20 July 68 at 2130,The object was observed every 5 minutes moving back and forth,The observer described the object as having an egg shape,There was insufficient data for further evaluation as the report lacked details,The letter from the Department of the Air Force acknowledged the witness's report.
